Title: Night of the Nearly Dead
Plot: Jumper-wearing pop sensation Eoin McLove comes to visit. Unfortunately his presence leads hundreds of infatuated middle-aged ladies to surround the house, and the usual hilarious mix-ups ensue. But McLove's easy-going stage persona masks a terrible secret..
ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
GuestStars: Patrick McDonnell, Maria Doyle Kennedy, Elva Crowley, Maggie Chevlin, Rosemary Murphy, Vincent Marzello
